content.question: Which of the following are the most likely short-run effects of an increase in government expenditures?

choices.label: Unemployment Rate: IncreaseInflation Rate: IncreaseReal Gross Domestic Product: Increase
Unemployment Rate: IncreaseInflation Rate: IncreaseReal Gross Domestic Product: Decrease
Unemployment Rate: DecreaseInflation Rate: IncreaseReal Gross Domestic Product: Increase
Unemployment Rate: DecreaseInflation Rate: DecreaseReal Gross Domestic Product: Increase
Unemployment Rate: No changeInflation Rate: DecreaseReal Gross Domestic Product: Increase

content.answer: Unemployment Rate: DecreaseInflation Rate: IncreaseReal Gross Domestic Product: Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
